title: Herein after, wherever bridges are constructed by Govt
clause_text: Herein after, wherever bridges are constructed by Govt./MCGM/Appropriate Authority, the same shall be provided with noise barriers as explained in Regulation No. 2(IV)(87) wherever necessary. 17 (1) Development of Reserved land for Public Purposes

source_pdf.text_snippet: Herein after, wherever bridges are constructed by Govt./MCGM/Appropriate Authority, the same shall be provided with noise barriers as explained in Regulation No. 2(IV)(87) wherever necessary.
